author: Joanne Chianello
title: 'A will of steel': Vera Etches is the face of Ottawa's fight against COVID-19
description: Vera Etches has been Ottawa's top doctor for less than two years. Now, she's leading the fight against one of the most deadly pandemics that most of us have ever lived through.
content:
It's rare for city officials to hold a press conference on a Sunday and when they do, it's almost never to deliver good news.
The March 15 news conference was no exception.
Only four days after Ottawa's first case of COVID-19 was confirmed, back when the to… [+12086 chars]
